data.text: Nia daangada o Judah gu hilihili Joahaz tama daane Josiah ga hagatulu a mee e hai di king i Jerusalem.
Joahaz gu madalua maa dolu ono ngadau, gei mee guu hai di king o Judah, gaa dagi i Jerusalem i nia malama e dolu.
Neco di king o Egypt guu lahi a mee galabudi, guu hai Judah gi hui anga dono dahi aga nia pauna silber e hidu mana ge lima lau (7,500), ge madahidu maa lima (75) pauna goolo.
Neco guu hai a Eliakim, tuaahina daane Joahaz, di king o Judah, gaa huli di ingoo o maa gi Jehoiakim. Joahaz guu lahi go Neco gi Egypt.
Jehoiakim gu madalua maa lima ono ngadau gei mee guu hai di king o Judah, gaa dagi i Jerusalem i nia ngadau e madangaholu maa dahi. Mee gu hai hala gi Dimaadua dono God.
King Nebuchadnezzar o Babylon gu heebagi gi Judah, guu kumi Jehoiakim, guu lahi a mee gi Babylon e lawalawa gi nia daula baalanga.
Nebuchadnezzar guu kae nia goloo maluagina o di Hale Daumaha, gaa dugu nia maa gi lodo dono hale king i Babylon.

Nia mee huogodoo Jehoiakim ne hai, mo ana hangaahai haga gulugulua mo di huaidu a mee ne hai la guu hihi i lodo Di Kai o nia King o Israel mo Judah. Tama daane a maa go Jehoiachin gaa pono di lohongo o maa gaa king.
Jehoiachin gu madangaholu maa walu ono ngadau, gei mee guu hai di king o Judah, gaa dagi i Jerusalem i nia malama e dolu ge madangaholu laangi. Mee hogi gu hai hala hai baahi ang gi Dimaadua.

Di madagoaa magalillili ne lawa, King Nebuchadnezzar guu lahi galabudi Jehoiachin gi Babylon, guu kae gi daha nia goloo maluagina o di Hale Daumaha. Nomuli, Nebuchadnezzar guu hai a Zedekiah, tuaahina tamana Jehoiachin, gii hai di king o Judah mo Jerusalem.
Zedekiah gu madalua maa dahi ono ngadau, gei mee guu hai di king o Judah, gaa dagi i Jerusalem i nia ngadau e madangaholu maa dahi.
Mee gu ihala hai baahi gi Dimaadua gei mee digi hagalongo manawa hila gi lala gi soukohp Jeremiah, dela e hagadele nnelekai a Dimaadua.

Zedekiah gu hai baahi gi King Nebuchadnezzar dela ne hono a mee bolo gi dowangi i di ingoo o God bolo ia ga hagalaamua a mee. Mee gu manawa hamaaloo gu de hiihai di huli dono mouli e hanimoi labelaa gi Dimaadua, di God o Israel.

Hagapuni anga, nia dagi o Judah, digau hai mee dabu mo nia daangada gu daudali nia hangaahai huaidu o nia henua i nadau baahi ala e daumaha gi nia balu god. Malaa, digaula gu hagamilimilia di Hale Daumaha dela ne hai go Dimaadua gi dabuaahia.
Dimaadua di God o nadau maadua mmaadua, gu duudagi hua i golo e haga hagau mai ana soukohp e hagailoo hagalliga gi ana daangada, idimaa Mee e hiihai e benebene digaula mo di Hale Daumaha.

Gei digaula gu hai hua nadau dadaagala gi digau kae hegau a God, gu hagabalumee ana helekai mo di gadagada gi ana soukohp, gaa dae loo gi tamanaiee o di hagawelewele Dimaadua ga deemee di nadau llele gi daha.

Deelaa laa Dimaadua gu laha mai di king o Babylonia belee hai tauwa gi digaula. Di king gu daaligi gii mmade nia dama daane o Judah i lodo di Hale Daumaha. Mee dono dumaalia ang gi tei daangada ai, digau lligi be mmaadua, taane be di ahina, magi be maaloo. God guu wanga digaula huogodoo gi mee.
Di king o Babylonia gu gaiaa di Hale Daumaha, di gowaa dugu nia bahihadu di Hale Daumaha, mo nia maluagina di king mo ana gau aamua, guu kae nia mee huogodoo gi Babylon.
Mee guu dudu gi lala di Hale Daumaha mo di waahale Jerusalem ngaadahi mo nia hale king mo ono maluagina, gu oho gi lala nia abaaba di waahale.
Mee guu lahi digau ala e mouli gi Babylonia, di gowaa dela e hai hege ai ginaadou gi mee mo ono hagadili gaa dae loo gi di gila aga di king o Persia e dagi dana waa henua damana.
Nia helekai Dimaadua ala ne kokohp mai soukohp Jeremiah la gu hagahonu i nia mee aanei:

I lodo tahi ngadau o Cyrus nogo hai di king aamua o Persia, Dimaadua guu hai a mee gi hihi dana haganoho ang gi ana henua huogodoo ala e dagi koia, bolo gi haga duulia aga dana haganoho, gi hagadele ina gi nia gowaa huogodoo o dono waa henua:

“Deenei taganoho a Cyrus di king aamua o Persia: Dimaadua go di God o di langi gu gaamai di mogobuna e dagi nia henua huogodoo i henuailala, gei gu hagaanga mai labelaa bolo ma ko au dela e hau dono Hale Daumaha i Jerusalem i Judah. Dolomeenei, goodou huogodoo ala nia daangada ni God, hula gi golo, gei Dimaadua di godou God la gi madalia goodou.”
